value:
$WmMPID_総選挙カミラ,ch05_28_Camilla_F_ELECTION01,Face|You have someone very dear to you,
don't you? Just like I do...$k$pI must protect my family at all costs.
Corrin is just that precious to me.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙ミカヤ,ch11_01_Micaiah_F_ELECTION01,Face|Yes, your feelings are much the
same as mine.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙カミラ,ch05_28_Camilla_F_ELECTION01,Face|There's more to it than that, though.
When we are separated, I can't help
but wonder...$k$pIs it just that I protect them? Or is
there more to it than that?$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙ミカヤ,ch11_01_Micaiah_F_ELECTION01,Face|They protect us too. They watch
over us. They are part of us.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙カミラ,ch05_28_Camilla_F_ELECTION01,Face|It seems we queens have much in
common!$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙ミカヤ,ch11_01_Micaiah_F_ELECTION01,Face|Yes... We have some striking
similarities.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_総選挙ミカヤ,ch11_01_Micaiah_F_ELECTION01,Face|This is as far as we go. We must
yield.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙カミラ,ch05_28_Camilla_F_ELECTION01,Face|Yes. Let us save our strength for
the battle ahead.$k$p$Sbs150|
